mapper.sql: id, org_id, name, share_type, sync_state, platform_id
mapper.insert:
insert into t_duty_gps_group
id,
org_id,
name,
share_type,
sync_state,
platform_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shareType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{syncState,jdbcType=BIT},
#{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_duty_gps_group
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
share_type = #{shareType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sync_state = #{syncState,jdbcType=BIT},
platform_id = #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_duty_gps_group set org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_type = #{shareType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sync_state = #{syncState,jdbcType=BIT}, platform_id = #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from t_duty_gps_group where name = #{name} and org_id = #{orgId}

select count(*) from t_duty_gps_group as g where g.org_id =#{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and g.name like CONCAT("%",#{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")

select distinct g.id, g.org_id, g.name, g.share_type, g.sync_state, g.platform_id, org.name as orgname, org.code as orgcode, org.path as orgPath from t_duty_gps_group_org pgo left join t_duty_gps_group g on g.id = pgo.gps_group_id left join organ org on g.org_id = org.id where pgo.org_id=#{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by g.id
